T02D1709b:70b-0: @70b // aom t'a re tutt'a re tsa la pra
T02D1709b:70b-1: tsa la sh'i ghram g'a mi ni de ba tatta
T02D1709b:70b-3: 'di bya rog gi sgros lan sum cu rtsa gcig
T02D1709b:70b-4: bzlas nas bsgrub bya'i sgo la sbas pas zhag bdun
T02D1709b:70b-6: sgrol ma'i gzungs kyis sri na lag la lan bdun bzlas la /
T02D1709b:70b-7: bdag gi mig gnyis phyis te /
T02D1709b:70b-8: de nas rgyal po'i drung du phyin na rgyal po
T02D1709b:70b-9: de slob ma lta bur 'gyur bas dad pa byed
T02D1709b:70b-10: pa dang / ngag tu mi smra /
T02D1709b:70b-14: 'di ni yid ches pas ngo mtshar ro //
T02D1709b:70b-15: bdag nyid sgrol mar bsgoms te /
T02D1709b:70b-16: tsha ba'i mar khus lus byug pa bya /
T02D1709b:70b-18: bzlas pa'i rjes su 'bras mkhar ma can gyi ma dag pa dri ma bton /
T02D1709b:70b-19: de la snum khur byas la bsgrub bya la byin na nges par the tshom med pa'o //
T02D1709b:70b-20: gos kyi thu ba nas bzung ste gang du 'gro
T02D1709b:70b-21: ba'i phyogs kyi gnod byed bkug la thu bar gtums
T02D1709b:70b-22: te mdud pa byas la sngags 'di lan bdun bsngags
T02D1709b:70b-23: la / 'jigs pa'i sa gang du 'gro yang 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
T02D1709b:70b-29: dred la sogs pas kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1709b:70b-30: dbang gi thab tu autpala dmar po'i sbyin sreg brgya
T02D1709b:70b-31: rtsa brgyad byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du
T02D1709b:70b-32: 'gyur ro // spra tshil dang ske tshe'i 'bras bu dang /
T02D1709b:70b-34: aa sho ka'i lo ma rnams mar dang sbrang rtsi'i
T02D1709b:70b-35: ldi gu dang bcas pas stong phrag lnga'i sbyin sreg
T02D1709b:70b-36: gis nyi ma bdun gyis rang 'dod pa'i bu mo
T02D1709b:70b-37: thob bo // aom t'a re tut'a re tu re
T02D1709b:70b-38: aa mu ka bhidha na ku m'a ri ma h'a
T02D1709b:70b-39: murbha he na ta pya pi t'a pra yatstsha du
T02D1709b:70b-40: thob bo // me sv'a h'a / rgya shug gi
T02D1709b:70b-41: tsher ma stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog
T02D1709b:70b-42: dang bcas pas sreg blugs byas na /
T02D1709b:70b-43: skyes pas sbyong ba'i bu mo yang 'gugs so //
T02D1709b:70b-45: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ka
T02D1709b:70b-46: bhatt'a nam sv'a tha na ta pas ka r'a ya
T02D1709b:70b-48: zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma
T02D1709b:70b-49: phyag gnyis zhal gcig ma lcags kyu dang autpala zhags
T02D1709b:70b-50: pa dang bcas pa rnams bri /
T02D1709b:71a-2: phyi nas bsgoms ldan sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T02D1709b:71a-3: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ki
T02D1709b:71a-4: ma ma ai pis tam sv'a bnam ka th'a ya
T02D1709b:71a-5: h'um phat / stong phrag ldas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1709b:71a-6: zhags pas aa mu ka'i mgrin pa bcings /
T02D1709b:71a-7: lcags kyus drangs nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i 'og tu bsams te /
T02D1709b:71a-8: khol mo'i tshul gyis bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1709b:71a-9: na mo gu ru bhya:me sbar bsangs nas thab bskyed /
T02D1709b:71a-10: byin brlabs spyan drangs pad gdan dbul //
T02D1709b:71a-11: chu bzhi phul la phyag rgya bstan //
T02D1709b:71a-12: dgug gzhug dbang bskur rgyas gang ba bya //
T02D1709b:71a-13: ku sha byon zan me ltas brtag / sreg rdzas phul nas mchod bstod bya //
T02D1709b:71a-14: nang mchod h'um tra dzva yis bsang //
T02D1709b:71a-15: 'das pa'i dam tshig bskyed cing gzhug / dbang bskur mchod bstod byon zan dbul //
T02D1709b:71a-16: sreg rdzas mchod bstod gsol ba gdab //
T02D1709b:71a-17: bzod gsol gshegs shing dam tshig bsdu //
T02D1709b:71a-18: me lha gsol gdab sreg rdzas kyi //
T02D1709b:71a-19: lhag ma phul la dgang blugs gsum //
T02D1709b:71a-20: yon bdag lag pa nas bzung dbul //
T02D1709b:71a-21: gtor ma mchod pa bstod pa dbul //
T02D1709b:71a-22: gsol ba gdab cing me lha gshegs //
